video.title: Michael Graham rocks the rim with jam

article.headline: Wright scores 19 to help Loyola Marymount defeat Detroit Mercy 76-56

images.name: Michael Graham rocks the rim with jam
images.caption: Michael Graham rocks the rim with jam

article.linkText: Wright scores 19 to help Loyola Marymount defeat Detroit Mercy 76-56
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- — Justin Wright had 19 points in Loyola Marymount's 76-56 victory over Detroit Mercy on Monday. Wright had six assists for the Lions (7-5). Dominick Harris scored 18 points while shooting 6 for 10 (3 for 5 from 3-point range) and 3 of 4 from the free throw line, and added five rebounds. Keli Leaupepe finished 5 of 7 from the field to finish with 11 points. Marcus Tankersley led the Titans (0-11) in scoring, finishing with 17 points. Detroit Mercy also got 13 points from Ryan Hurst. In addition, Jamail Pink had six points and two steals. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
